answers.answer: I was pretty convinced I didn't have any cravings but apparently the need to crunch things it a craving. Like trebor mints or powdery sweets I like crunching them so much. And also smelling dishwasher tablets I really want to crunch it but I know I can't :(
Mars bar and prawn cocktail crisps together yummmmmM

That mac n cheese sounds sooo delicious. Wish I could have it but I can't because of gestational diabetes. I would drizzle hot sauce alll over it lol. But I love sweets. And spicy stuff! And mint and chocolate is sooo good. Food food food :))) more flavor the better!!

question: Has anyone had weird cravings or invented new meals during pregnancy ? 37 weeks along and made boxed Mac and cheese at 3 am with hot pepper flakes, hot sauce, shredded Colby jack cheese  and crumbed crackers on top. I was tempted to throw it in the oven but I just couldn't wait to dive in. (I know it's probably not the healthiest but mama just couldn't help it this time) what are some out of the ordinary craving combinations you ladies have experienced so far?
title: Weird food inventions?
